Article Title: India ODI squad: KL Rahul appointed skipper, Ravindra Jadeja returns; Axar Patel left out
Article Text:
PERTH, AUSTRALIA - OCTOBER 19: KL Rahul of India takes a return throw during game one of the One Day International series between Australia and India at Perth Stadium on October 19, 2025 in Perth, Australia. (Photo by Paul Kane/Getty Images)

NEW DELHI:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Shubman Gill ruled out of South Africa ODIs; three captaincy candidates emerge

TimesofIndia.com

Poll How do you feel about KL Rahul being appointed as the captain for the upcoming ODI series against South Africa? Excited Indifferent Concerned Disappointed

India‚Äôs ODI squad:

India have announced their squad for the three ODIs against South Africa, and as expected, KL Rahul will lead the side in the series starting November 30.In a notable development, Axar Patel has not been included, while Ravindra Jadeja returns to the ODI mix after being dropped for the series against Australia. The other surprising omission from the squad is Varun Chakravarthy, who was India‚Äôs trump card in the Champions Trophy.Ashad first reported on November 22 , regular captain Shubman Gill wasn‚Äôt available due to a neck injury, Hardik Pandya is yet to regain match fitness, and Jasprit Bumrah has been rested for the series. Tilak Varma‚Äôs addition to the middle order is a sign of things to come, as the team management is keen to inject more left-handers into the middle order.India have had a very right-hand‚Äìdominated ODI batting order, and in the build-up to the 2027 ODI World Cup, different combinations will be tried. Tilak and Rishabh Pant could get their chances in the upcoming fixtures, as Shreyas Iyer‚Äôs injury allows the think tank to explore all options before the vice-captain regains match fitness.The biggest talking point, however, remains Jadeja over Axar Patel. Not too long ago, the men‚Äôs senior selection committee led by Ajit Agarkar had ignored Jadeja for the ODI series in Australia.Agarkar had explained why there was no need for an extra left-arm spinner and clearly indicated that Axar was ahead of Jadeja in the format.‚ÄúHe is very much in the plans. But there will be some competition for places. Of course, he was there in the Champions Trophy squad because we took those extra spinners with the conditions there. At the moment, we could only carry one and get some balance in the team with Washi and Kuldeep there as well. And I don‚Äôt think we are going to need more than that in Australia,‚Äù Agarkar had said.Axar picked up three wickets in as many games and made contributions of 31 and 44 in the two opportunities with the bat but didn‚Äôt make the 15-member squad for the three games against South Africa.Veteran speedster Mohammed Shami continues to be ignored, even after proving his match fitness in the domestic circuit, as selectors have stuck with the likes of Harshit Rana, Prasidh Krishna and Arshdeep Singh. Mohammed Siraj also seems to have been rested for the series.Rohit Sharma, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Virat Kohli, Tilak Varma, KL Rahul (C) (wk), Rishabh Pant (wk), Washington Sundar, Ravindra Jadeja, Kuldeep Yadav, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Harshit Rana, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Prasidh Krishna, Arshdeep Singh, Dhruv Jurel
Article Summary: India have announced their squad for the three odis against south africa. Kl rahul will lead the side in the series starting november 30. Axar patel has not been included, while ravindra jadeja returns to the odi mix after being dropped for the series against australia.

Article Title: 'It was uncomfortable for me': US F-16 pilot 'shocked' that Dubai air show went on even after Tejas crash
Article Text:
US F-16 pilot Taylor Hiester expressed shock that the Dubai Air Show continued even after Tejas crash.



IAF Officer Namansh Syal Flown Back to India After Tejas Jet Crash in Dubai Air Show

'It was uncomfortable for me'





Captain Taylor Hiester, a pilot of the US F-16 team who was at the Dubai Air Show where a Tejas fighter jet crashed, killing Wing Commander Namansh Syal, expressed his disbelief and shock that the show was not cancelled even after the tragic event. Hiester said their team was preparing their show when the accident took place. The event was not called off despite the tragedy but the US team and a few other decided to cancel their performance out of respect to the pilot and his colleagues and family.As he headed to the US, he shared his emotions which were a mix of shock and discomfort as he also slammed the organisers for going on with the show."After two years of doing this job, that was a first for our team and it came just before our final performance of the season. Together and individually, we all quietly watched the aftermath unfold from a distance thinking about the Indian maintenance crew standing on the ramp next to an empty parking spot, aircraft ladder laid on the ground, the pilot's belongings still in his rental car," Hiester wrote.Hiester recounted that after the fire was put out, the organisers notified the participants that the display would continue. Their team left but he returned to the site an hour or two later hoping that he would find an empty space.But to his disappointment, the announcer was still enthusiastic and people were watching the show.Hiester said the moment was uncomfortable for him as he imagined his team walking out of the show without him and other participants preparing for their performance. "I was shaken awake by this truth -- despite whatever guise, whatever 'rockstar treatment', fancy dinners and sponsor chlets, my team who became my family is all I ever had in the first place."Questioning the concept of 'the show must go on', Hiester said it is true that the show must go on but everyone should remember that the show will go one when they are gone too.
Article Summary: Us f-16 pilot taylor hiester expressed shock that the dubai air show continued even after tejas crash. The event was not called off despite the tragedy but the us team and a few other decided to cancel their performance out of respect to the pilot and his colleagues.

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes stuns in red leather dress on romantic date with Patrick Mahomes before he leads Chiefs into showdown with Colts
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes dazzles at 1587 Prime.

Patrick and Brittany Mahomes enjoy personal moments at 1587 prime while gearing up for key chiefs game

More NFL coverage

Kansas City fans are bracing for a pivotal showdown as Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs return to Arrowhead Stadium to face the Indianapolis Colts. After back-to-back road losses to the Bills and Broncos, Mahomes knows the margin for error has vanished. The team (5‚Äë5) needs a win to keep its AFC playoff hopes alive, and all eyes are on the three-time Super Bowl MVP to bounce back. Beyond the pressure of the field, Mahomes also found moments of personal joy, giving fans a glimpse into life outside football.Off the field, Mahomes spent Friday evening with his wife, Brittany, enjoying a rare night out before the high-stakes matchup. Brittany shared several updates on Instagram, spotlighting her red leather outfit for dinner at 1587 Prime, the Kansas City steakhouse Mahomes opened with Travis Kelce earlier this year. The posts allowed followers to see a different side of the quarterback, one grounded in family, love, and life beyond the playbook.In one post, Brittany drew attention to a small detail in her outfit, writing, ‚Äú1587 & a cute bow,‚Äù with her back turned to the camera. She later shared a black-and-white photo giving her 2.1 million followers a clear look at the front of her ensemble. 1587 Prime has become a hotspot for Chiefs players and NFL personalities alike, with Travis Kelce and his fiancee, Taylor Swift, among the frequent guests.The restaurant honors both Mahomes‚Äô No. 15 and Kelce‚Äôs No. 87, and even offers signature cocktails inspired by their partners.Patrick Mahomes didn‚Äôt appear in Brittany‚Äôs Friday night posts, but she gave him a nod earlier in the day for his thoughtful gesture. A bouquet of ‚Äújust because flowers‚Äù from her high school sweetheart appeared on her Instagram story with the caption, ‚Äú@patrickmahomes you are the best ever.‚Äù Moments like these show a couple enjoying each other‚Äôs company and staying grounded, even amid the demands of the NFL season.Last week, Patrick and Brittany Mahomes took part in a light-hearted promotion with CommunityAmerica Credit Union where they painted portraits of each other. Patrick warned that he wasn‚Äôt much of an artist, and Brittany‚Äôs reaction proved it. She laughed when she saw the portrait he made of her, joking about how he drew her teeth and pointing out the big eyelashes he added. Patrick, meanwhile, complimented Brittany‚Äôs drawing of him, saying it actually looked like him.As the Chiefs prepare to take on the Colts, the Mahomes pair brings off-field positivity into a high-pressure weekend. Brittany‚Äôs style, their shared moments, and Patrick‚Äôs focus on bouncing back all contribute to the narrative heading into a crucial home game. Fans will be watching to see if that energy translates to a strong performance on the field and another stylish appearance from Brittany during gameday.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes and his wife, brittany, enjoyed a rare night out on friday. The couple dined at 1587 prime, the steakhouse mahomes opened with travis kelce. The chiefs take on the indianapolis colts at arrowhead stadium on sunday.

Article Title: LiAngelo Ball, brother of NBA stars LaMelo and Lonzo Ball, makes Platinum history with breakout hit ‚ÄúTweaker‚Äù featuring Drake
Article Text:
LiAngelo Ball (Image via AP Photo)

How ‚ÄúTweaker‚Äù Became a Cultural Phenomenon

GELO - Tweaker (Official Video)

Tweaker's Chart Domination and Viral Impact on Fans

How LiAngelo Ball Went From Basketball to Music Trailblazer

LiAngelo Ball‚Äôs transformation from overlooked basketball prospect to music industry headliner has officially reached a historic milestone. His debut single ‚ÄúTweaker,‚Äù released under the stage name Gelo, has achieved platinum status - an achievement that puts him in the same conversation as heavyweight artists like Drake . For an athlete-turned-musician, this level of success is both unprecedented and culturally significant, signaling a genuine crossover moment that few have ever achieved.In addition to redefining LiAngelo's public persona, this achievement represents the pinnacle of a swift ascent that started in early 2025. LiAngelo, a musician who was frequently overshadowed by his brothers Lonzo and LaMelo Ball, has carved out a whole new path, demonstrating that his musical drive and artistic intuition were much more than a curiosity.Released in January 2025, ‚ÄúTweaker‚Äù exploded online almost instantly. Its nostalgic, bouncy beat - powered by piano, organ keys, and lush synth pads - captured the spirit of early-2000s hip-hop. Paired with Gelo‚Äôs melodic, sing-song delivery and a catchy ‚Äúwhoa‚Äù hook reminiscent of Big Tymers-era anthems, the track resonated widely. Produced by Kunica and Glockie Cheez, the song painted a picture of luxury, swagger, and newfound fame, creating an irresistible vibe that appealed to both younger listeners and fans of classic hip-hop aesthetics.The song's momentum grew even more when it gained popularity in sports culture. When NBA and NFL teams like the Detroit Lions, Chicago Bulls, and Cleveland Cavaliers started using "Tweaker" as a happy anthem in locker rooms and warm-up routines, it quickly gained popularity outside of the usual music circles.The success of ‚ÄúTweaker‚Äù eventually led to a massive $13 million record deal with Def Jam and Universal Music Group. The contract included an extraordinary $8 million guaranteed signing bonus‚Äîmore than what many current NBA players earn annually. This landmark deal solidified Gelo‚Äôs credibility and marketability within the hip-hop and R&B world.A well-known remix with Lil Wayne gave the song even more momentum and the endorsement of one of the biggest names in rap.‚ÄúTweaker‚Äù made history by reaching No. 1 on the US Rhythmic Billboard chart - an exceptional feat for a debut single from a former basketball player. The song sparked viral dance trends across social platforms and earned praise from artists like T-Pain, Lil Yachty, and Joe Budden. Its appeal spanned music, sports, and online culture, cementing LiAngelo Ball as 2025‚Äôs breakout music star.Before rising to prominence in the music industry, LiAngelo Ball spent years navigating the NBA G-League and international basketball leagues. Eventually, he gave up the sport entirely, a decision that was validated by his outstanding achievements. His debut album League of My Own, which was released in July 2025, showcased his growth as a musician and cemented his place in the industry.Also read: Angel Reese responds with 4-word message after her name is dragged into viral NBA courtside altercation LiAngelo Ball's platinum achievement for "Tweaker" is a significant cultural event rather than only a personal victory. By breaking into the music business and topping charts, he has produced a singular success narrative that connects popular culture, sports, and entertainment.
Article Summary: Liangelo ball's debut single ‚Äútweaker,‚Äù released under the stage name gelo, has achieved platinum status. For an athlete-turned-musician, this level of success is both unprecedented and culturally significant. The song's momentum grew even more when it gained popularity in sports culture.

Article Title: Smriti Mandhana‚ÄìPalash Muchhal wedding indefinitely postponed; cricketer‚Äôs father unwell
Article Text:
Palash Muchhal and Smriti Mandhana at their mehendi ceremony (X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Smriti Mandhana & Palash Muchhal‚Äôs Haldi Ceremony Begins!

The highly anticipated wedding of Indian cricket star Smriti Mandhana and music composer-filmmaker Palash Muchhal, originally scheduled for this Sunday in Sangli, has been postponed indefinitely.Mandhana‚Äôs manager, Tuhin Mishra, confirmed that the decision came after her father, Shriniwas Mandhana, fell unwell.‚ÄúThis morning, while having breakfast, Smriti‚Äôs father suddenly felt unwell. We waited for a while, hoping he would feel better, but his condition worsened. To be safe, we called an ambulance and took him to the hospital. He is currently under observation,‚Äù Mishra told PTI.The family has decided to prioritise his health, leading to the postponement of the ceremony.Mandhana, one of Indian cricket‚Äôs most prominent faces and a recent World Cup champion, was set to marry Muchhal in an intimate ceremony attended only by close family and friends.The celebrations in Sangli had been underway through the week, with fans catching rare glimpses of the usually reserved opener enjoying her pre-wedding festivities.Mandhana and Muchhal‚Äôs relationship goes back to 2019, when they met through mutual friends in Mumbai‚Äôs creative circles.The couple kept their bond private for years while balancing demanding careers ‚Äî Mandhana leading India‚Äôs charge on the global stage and Muchhal expanding his footprint in films and music.They made their relationship public only in July 2024, on their fifth anniversary.Since then, the couple has shared limited but cherished glimpses of their journey, including Muchhal‚Äôs widely discussed proposal at DY Patil Stadium following India‚Äôs World Cup triumph.Leading a blindfolded Mandhana onto the very pitch where she had made history, Muchhal went down on one knee with a ring, later cementing the moment with a tattoo of ‚ÄúSM18‚Äù on his forearm.The couple was to formalise their union on November 23, 2025, a date they had chosen to mark the beginning of their next chapter. With the ceremony now postponed indefinitely, the family is prioritising Mandhana‚Äôs father‚Äôs health.The couple has not issued a public statement yet.
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana and palash muchhal's wedding has been postponed indefinitely. Her father, shriniwas mandhana, fell unwell this morning. The family has decided to prioritise his health, leading to the postponement of the ceremony.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes melts hearts with surprise gift for baby Golden and wife Brittany ahead of a must-win game against Colts
Article Text: Despite a challenging on-field period for the Chiefs, quarterback Patrick Mahomes provided a heartwarming moment at home, surprising his daughters with flowers. This affectionate gesture, shared by his wife Brittany, offered a much-needed boost as the team faces a critical game against the Colts, aiming to avoid a rare three-game losing streak and keep their season alive.
Article Summary: Chiefs quarterback patrick mahomes surprised his daughters with flowers. The affectionate gesture was shared by his wife brittany. The chiefs face a critical game against the colts on sunday. They are aiming to avoid a rare three-game losing streak and keep their season alive.

Article Title: Will Aaron Rodgers play against Chicago Bears today? Latest injury update on the Steelers QB
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers injury update (Getty Images)

Will Aaron Rodgers play against Bears?



The Pittsburgh Steelers enter Week 12 carrying both momentum and uncertainty. Aaron Rodgers has been officially listed as questionable on Mike Tomlin‚Äôs final injury report before the game between the Pittsburgh Steelers and the Chicago Bears. His left wrist fracture has kept fans guessing all week, and the tension has only grown as kickoff inches closer. Last weekend, he planned to return against the Cincinnati Bengals, but team doctors stepped in and stopped him. That moment changed everything for the Steelers‚Äô immediate future.Mason Rudolph stepped in and turned an uneasy situation into a statement win. His sharp command powered a 34-12 victory at Acrisure Stadium, giving Pittsburgh confidence. Still, the central question now is whether Rodgers will be ready to return to Soldier Field or if the Super Bowl champion quarterback will wait one more week.Aaron Rodgers is listed as questionable, which means Sunday‚Äôs decision sits in the hands of doctors and Mike Tomlin. A report from Tom Pelissero revealed that Rodgers has pushed to play, but medical staff warned that one bad hit could cause a displaced fracture and keep him out for the rest of the season. Tomlin kept his stance steady, saying, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll see where the weekend leads us.‚ÄùThe quarterback did not practice on Wednesday but returned in a limited capacity on Thursday and Friday.He wore a brace at practice to support the small fracture in his non throwing wrist. The wrap allowed him to catch shotgun snaps and hold the ball in one hand. His availability depends on how well that brace protects the injury and whether he can function with it during live action.If Rodgers cannot suit up, Mason Rudolph will take the field again. Rudolph completed 12 of 16 passes for 127 yards and a touchdown in last week‚Äôs win, earning a 118.5 passer rating. Meanwhile, the Steelers expect Cam Heyward and Darius Slay back from injury, which strengthens their defensive outlook in Chicago.The Bears are preparing for their eighth win in nine games and hoping to shake off years of frustration against Rodgers. His career record against Chicago stands at 25-5, and he has not played at Soldier Field since 2022. With Rodgers saying he is ‚Äúpretty sure‚Äù this will be his final season, Sunday could mark his last trip to one of his most memorable stages if he is cleared in time.Also Read: Bill Belichick caught in family firestorm after Jen Belichick‚Äôs heated rant targeting girlfriend Jordon Hudson post-UNC game
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers is listed as questionable for sunday's game against the chicago bears. The packers quarterback has a small fracture in his non-throwing wrist. If rodgers cannot play, mason rudolph will take the field for the steelers. Pittsburgh beat the cincinnati bengals 34-12 last week.

Article Title: Smriti Mandhana and Palash Muchhal‚Äôs wedding: What‚Äôs the net worth of the power couple?
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana & Palash Muchhal

Palash Muchhal Proposes Cricketer Smriti Mandhana At DY Patil Stadium!

Vice-captain Smriti Mandhana , one of India‚Äôs most celebrated and consistent women cricketers, is all set to marry music composer Palash Muchhal on November 23. The engagement itself was nothing short of cinematic: Palash proposed to Smriti at Mumbai‚Äôs DY Patil Stadium, the very venue where India clinched the Women‚Äôs World Cup earlier this month. Fans are now curious not just about their love story but also about the combined wealth of this power couple.Smriti‚Äôs earnings on the cricket field are substantial. She holds a Grade A contract with the BCCI , which comes with an annual retainer of Rs 50 lakh. On top of that, she receives match fees for every international appearance: Rs 15 lakh per Test, Rs 6 lakh per ODI, and Rs 3 lakh per T20I. Coupled with her growing list of endorsements and Women‚Äôs Premier League income, her net worth is estimated at around Rs 34 crore.The Women‚Äôs Premier League has been a major boost for Smriti‚Äôs finances. During the inaugural WPL auction, Royal Challengers Bengaluru acquired her for Rs 3.4 crore per season, making her one of the highest-paid female cricketers globally. Leading RCB to a WPL title further enhanced her brand value, reportedly increasing it by nearly 30%.Smriti‚Äôs brand endorsements add significantly to her wealth. Over the years, she has collaborated with major brands including Hyundai, Hero Motocorp, Red Bull, Garnier, Nike, Mastercard, Havells, Wrangler, Gulf Oil, Herbalife, Bata Power, and UNICEF India.Each campaign reportedly earns her between Rs 50 lakh and Rs 75 lakh, depending on its scale, contributing to her estimated net worth of Rs 32-34 crore.Palash Muchhal, meanwhile, has carved a successful path in music and filmmaking. Born in Indore in 1995 into a musical family, with sister Palak Muchhal already a known playback singer, Palash honed his talent early in Hindustani classical music and performed in charity concerts during his childhood.He has composed songs for films, television, and independent singles, with hits like ‚ÄúParty Toh Banti Hai‚Äù (Bhoothnath Returns), ‚ÄúTu Hi Hai Aashiqui‚Äù (Dishkiyaoon), and ‚ÄúMusafir.‚Äù Beyond composing, he has directed over 40 music videos for major labels like T-Series and Zee Music, and has even acted in the film Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey. His net worth is estimated between Rs 20 crore and Rs 41 crore, coming from royalties, film projects, live shows, and music composition.Together, Smriti and Palash form one of cricket and entertainment‚Äôs wealthiest couples, with a combined net worth estimated between Rs 50 crore and Rs 75 crore. The duo has been dating since 2019 but maintained a low profile for years, only hinting at their relationship publicly in October 2025 when Palash teased that Smriti would soon become the ‚Äúdaughter-in-law of Indore.‚Äù
Article Summary: Palash muchhal proposed to smriti mandhana at mumbai‚Äôs dy patil stadium. The duo has been dating since 2019 but maintained a low profile for years. Palash has composed songs for films, television, and independent singles. He has directed over 40 music videos for major labels like t-series and zee music.

Article Title: How 49ers fullback Kyle Juszczyk impressed his wife with his social media etiquette
Article Text:
Kyle and Kristin Juszczyk talk about their love story. Source: X

Kyle and Kristin Juszczyk's love story began on Facebook, and the 49ers star had a sleek move up her sleeve

George Kittle & Kyle Juszczyk Are Spirit Bros!? | Pokemon Cards, Kristin Juszczyk Off Season & MORE!

Also Read: More coverage on the NFL

It‚Äôs no secret that the San Francisco 49ers released fullback Kyle Juszczyk this March to refocus their energy on a younger crop and to manage the salary cap, even though the team later re-signed him to a new, cheaper contract.Juszczyk recently opened up about the emotional moment during the ‚ÄúKittle Things‚Äù podcast with San Francisco teammate and tight end George Kittle and his wife, Claire. Kyle and Kristin Juszczyk also opened up about their love story on the same podcast, and fans couldn‚Äôt help but gush about their fairy tale.Kyle Juszczyk‚Äôs wife, Kristin, is a popular sportswear designer and is now an officially licensed NFL partner, which gives her the right to use the league‚Äôs logos on her designs. Over the years, the two have shared countless viral moments, from their quirky pregame and postgame handshake to Kyle spotting Kristin in the crowd after scoring.But how did their story begin? The couple recently talked about their memorable first meeting during a joint appearance on George and Claire Kittle‚Äôs podcast.‚ÄúI had just transferred to Towson University. We‚Äôre going to bring Uncle John into this. Everyone has an Uncle John, I feel like,‚Äù Kristin said.‚ÄúMy cousin was going to a nearby college. [Uncle John] got tickets to go see the [Baltimore] Ravens. I had never been to an NFL game before. My cousin didn‚Äôt want to go, so he texted me like, ‚ÄòDo you want to come to the game?‚Äô And I was like, ‚ÄòYeah, of course, why not? I‚Äôve never been.‚Äô They were playing the [Carolina] Panthers. You guys were whooping ass. So we got nosebleed seats, but they were whooping ass, so everyone left. It was like a 30-point difference.‚ÄùKristin also shared a rather uncanny moment where she spoke about marrying Kyle one day, on the day she saw him. Needless to say, she manifested her dreams into reality!‚ÄúSo Uncle John was like, ‚ÄòLet‚Äôs go behind the bench. Let‚Äôs go down there!‚Äô So we go behind the bench and long story short, I saw Kyle on the field and thought he was very handsome. And I had a pamphlet because it was my first ever NFL game, so I was taking everything they were giving to me. I was looking through the pamphlet and I was like, ‚ÄòOh my God, he‚Äôs only 23! He went to Harvard? OK, check.‚Äô And then I went to Aunt Lisa ‚Äî as a joke ‚Äî like, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm going to marry that guy one day. ‚Äô I swear to God.‚ÄùKyle and Kristin tied the knot in 2019, but quite a lot happened before they made their relationship official. Their love story unravelled on social media! In fact Kristin broke it down to the T.‚ÄúA few weeks later, I told my friends about it and they were like, ‚ÄòJust request him on Facebook,‚Äô because this was before Instagram was big. And then Kyle started liking my pictures from like five years ago.‚ÄùKyle admitted he was selective with his likes, only tapping on photos that featured Kristin alone. If the picture included friends or family, he scrolled right past it. He wanted her to know she had his full attention.Even so, the determined NFL star never went beyond quietly liking her posts.‚ÄúHe never messaged me! He was just being a creeper and liking my pictures,‚Äù Kristin shared. ‚ÄúA week goes by and I got a little liquid courage and I said, ‚ÄòHey, what are the chances I‚Äôll bump into you downtown?‚Äô ‚ÄúKyle recalled that his team the Ravens had a game that week, so he replied to Kristin saying the timing wasn‚Äôt ideal. Still, he told her he‚Äôd love to go out to dinner another time.They eventually met at a restaurant, and Kristin admitted she was ‚Äúso nervous,‚Äù since she was only 20 then. But the jitters didn‚Äôt last long; the two connected right away, and the conversation flowed easily.‚ÄúWe literally closed down the restaurant,‚Äù Kyle said. ‚ÄúWe were there for like three and a half hours. Neither of us were willing to get up and go pee, even though we both had to go so bad. So after three and a half hours, we were like, ‚ÄúOK, they‚Äôre closing the restaurant, we should probably go pee before we leave.‚Äô "
Article Summary: Kyle and kristin juszczyk talk about their love story. The couple recently talked about their memorable first meeting. Kristin also shared a rather uncanny moment where she spoke about marrying kyle one day, on the day she saw him. Kyle admitted he was selective with his likes, only tapping on photos that featured kristin alone.

Article Title: Trinity Rodman‚Äôs mother offers heartfelt support as the Washington Spirit forward struggles through yet another emotional blow
Article Text:
Trinity Rodman (Image via AP Photo/Benjamin Fanjoy, file)

Trinity Rodman‚Äôs mother shares a heartwarming message after the Washington Spirit NWSL loss

Trinity Rodman's boyfriend Ben Shelton offers emotional support to her after NWSL loss

Trinity Rodman experienced a major setback during NWSL finals. The Washington Spirit were dominated by Gotham FC on Saturday. Rodman led Spirit failed to create an impact after tasting the success back in 2021. However, even after maintaining their consistent performance all through the championship, the Washington Spirit finished as runner up against the Gotham FC.After the devastating loss against Gotham FC, Trinity Rodman‚Äôs mother wrote a heart touching for her. As the Washington Spirits‚Äô forward struggled to make an impact, her mother proved that irrespective of anything and everything she will always be her biggest cheerleader.Washington Spirit talented forward Trinity Rodman turned emotional after their NWSL loss against Gotham FC. The Spirits succumbed to the Gotham FC leaving their fans and followers heartbroken. Trinity Rodman could not hold back her tears after their NWSL loss. However, her mother took to Instagram and shared a heartwarming message for her athlete daughter and son DJ Rodman, hyping up both her kids while watching them play their respective sports.Michelle Mayor wrote,"When both kids are playing at the same timeüíï.‚ÄùHowever, Trinity Rodman's clearly proved that she is one of the biggest cheerleaders of the Washington Spirit's forward.After the first whistle, Trinity Rodman could not hold back her emotions and was in tears. Reportedly, she was seen hugging her boyfriend Ben Shelton after Washington Spirit loss. Shelton was busy with his boyfriend duties off the Tennis court comforting his girlfriend Trinity Rodman. He was spotted kissing her forehead as she could not stop crying after the NWSL loss against Gotham FC. The duo looked unaffected by the crowd and were sharing their own moment.Shelton and Rodman began dating in early 2025 and later confirmed their relationship through social media. Despite hectic careers, they frequently share lighthearted moments that give fans a look into their connection. Rodman balances her responsibilities with the Washington Spirit in the NWSL, while Shelton spends most of the year traveling for ATP Tour events, leaving both to navigate a relationship built around distance, and commitment.Washington Spirits‚Äô forward Trinity Rodman is one of the aspiring stars in the National Women's Soccer League. With her hard work and dedication on the ground, Rodman has already turned into an inspiration for millions of girls across the globe.Also Read: Michael Jordan brings back 23 for Ryder's Cup while rooting for Team USA - and a close friend
Article Summary: Trinity rodman experienced a major setback during nwsl finals. The washington spirit were dominated by gotham fc on saturday. Rodman led spirit failed to create an impact after tasting the success back in 2021. However, her mother wrote a heart touching message for her.

Article Title: Who is Senuran Muthusamy? Know the South Africa batter who smashed a ton against India
Article Text:
Senuran Muthusamy smashed a 192-ball century against India on Day 2 and played a huge role in his side crossing the 400-run mark on Sunday. (AP Photo/Anupam Nath)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Shubman Gill ruled out of South Africa ODIs; three captaincy candidates emerge

Poll Was Muthusamy's maiden Test century a turning point for South Africa in this match? Definitely, India are out of this game now Somewhat, but the match is still open Not really, India can still come back

Senuran Muthusamy picked the biggest stage available to him to deliver the defining innings of his career. The South African all-rounder raised his maiden Test century on Day 2 of the Guwahati Test, a calm, stubborn and eventually punishing knock that pushed India onto the back foot and gave the visitors control of the match.By lunch, South Africa had moved to 428 for 7 in 137 overs, with Muthusamy unbeaten on 107 off 203 balls. His innings included ten fours and two sixes, and came after an 88-run seventh-wicket stand with Kyle Verreynne, who was later stumped for 45 off 122. Marco Jansen joined him next and continued the same tempo, adding to a morning that steadily chipped away at India‚Äôs already stretched attack.The resistance deepened India‚Äôs frustration, which was evident in stand-in captain Rishabh Pant‚Äôs stump-mic remarks. At one point, he told his bowlers, "Yaar 30 seconds ka timer hai," adding, "Ghar pe khel rahe ho kya? Ek ball daal jaldi."For Muthusamy, 31, the innings marked a major personal breakthrough. Born in Durban on 22 February 1994 to parents of Indian origin, he grew up with strong links to his Tamil heritage, with extended family still based in Nagapattinam, Tamil Nadu.His cricketing path began at Clifton School in Durban, where he also pursued academics.He also completed a degree in media and marketing, although cricket was to be his path.He then eventually made a name for himself with the Dolphins, and became a regular for the CSA 4-Day series first-class side in 2016/17, where he initially made his mark as a batter. He then put more focus on bowling and later completed the shift that turned him into a genuine all-rounder. That growth earned him a place in South Africa‚Äôs 2019 Test squad, where he dismissed Virat Kohli for his first scalp on debut in Visakhapatnam.In Guwahati, Muthusamy showed the full extent of that evolution. Patient early on and selective through the morning, he was in firm in control by the time he reached three figures. His knock, built on discipline rather than risk, ensured South Africa dictated terms through the session and kept India searching for answers as the Test moved deeper into Day 2.His ton also meant that he is the third South African batter to score a Test century from number 7 or lower against India. Quinton de Kock (111 in Visakhapatnam, 2019) and Lance Klusener (102* in Cape Town, 1997) were the other two to achieve this feat.Shortly after the final session of the day resumed, his magic run ended, with Mohammed Siraj dismissing him in his first ball after lunch, as Muthusamy holed one out to Jaiswal at fine-leg.
Article Summary: Senuran muthusamy scored his maiden test century on day 2 of the guwahati test. The south african all-rounder was unbeaten on 107 off 203 balls. His innings included ten fours and two sixes, and came after an 88-run seventh-wicket stand with kyle verreynne.

Article Title: Nyier Daniels behind the bars as felony child cruelty and police evasion rock Georgia football program
Article Text:
Nyier Daniels arrested (Getty Images)

The Georgia football program‚Äôs string of driving-related incidents continues



The Georgia football program is once again under the microscope after another driving-related arrest involving one of its players, extending a troubling pattern that has now surpassed 20 incidents in less than two years. Georgia offensive lineman Nyier Daniels was arrested Sunday morning and remains incarcerated at the time of this writing. The timing was striking, given that Daniels had just appeared in his third game of the season during Georgia‚Äôs 35 to 3 win over Charlotte on Saturday, logging 10 snaps for the Bulldogs. The redshirt freshman, once a highly regarded recruit, now finds his future in complete uncertainty.Online jail records indicate Daniels is facing three felony and 10 misdemeanor charges following his arrest by Commerce Police at 10 a.m. Sunday. Among the listed charges were two felony second degree cruelty to children charges and a felony fleeing or attempting to elude a police officer. The misdemeanor charges include stop and yield sign violations, reckless driving, and improper passing. The University of Georgia acknowledged the arrest publicly, stating, ‚ÄúWe are aware of the charges and are currently in the process of gathering additional information.This is a pending legal matter and we will not have further comment at this time,‚Äù team spokesman Steven Drummond told the outlet.Daniels was ranked as a promising talent out of Bergen Catholic in New Jersey, and the expectations around him grew after early season participation that included 12 snaps in the opener against Marshall and nine more against Austin Peay. But DawgsHQ has reported that Daniels is no longer with the team, and the separation appears consistent with recent disciplinary moves from head coach Kirby Smart.Earlier this year, Smart indefinitely suspended receiver Nitro Tuggle and offensive lineman Marquis Easley after separate driving-related arrests. The gravity of these incidents carries heavy weight at Georgia, especially in light of the 2023 fatal crash that killed offensive lineman Devin Willock and recruiting staffer Chandler LeCroy after it was alleged LeCroy was racing defensive tackle Jalen Carter.The most recent arrest threatens to reignite national scrutiny at a critical moment. Georgia is preparing for a postseason run, and staying clear of off-field disruptions will be vital for continuity and focus. With the Bulldogs preparing to take on Georgia Tech in their "Clean, Old-Fashioned Hate" rivalry game at Mercedes-Benz Stadium, attention now shifts to how the program enforces accountability and ensures player conduct aligns with the standards expected in Athens.Also Read: Taylor Swift celebrates wild Chiefs overtime win after Travis Kelce‚Äôs wiped-out touchdown fuels dramatic Week 12 chaos
Article Summary: Georgia offensive lineman nyier daniels was arrested sunday morning and remains incarcerated at the time of this writing. The redshirt freshman, once a highly regarded recruit, now finds his future in complete uncertainty. Daniels is facing three felony and 10 misdemeanor charges following his arrest by commerce police.

Article Title: Smriti Mandhana Wedding: Smriti Mandhana set to tie the knot with Palash Muchhal today: All you need to know
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana is all set to marry music composer and filmmaker Palash Muchhal in an intimate afternoon ceremony on Sunday (Image credit: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Palash Muchhal Proposes Cricketer Smriti Mandhana At DY Patil Stadium!

Smriti will marry music composer Palash Muchhal on November 23, 2025, in Sangli, Maharashtra.

The couple met in 2019 and kept their relationship private until July 2024.

Palash proposed at DY Patil Stadium and got a tattoo of Smriti‚Äôs initials and jersey number, ‚ÄòSM18‚Äô.

Pre-wedding celebrations reveal a more expressive side of Smriti, while the couple balances their high-profile careers.

NEW DELHI: Indian cricket star and World Cup winner Smriti Mandhana is all set to marry music composer and filmmaker Palash Muchhal in an intimate afternoon ceremony on Sunday, in her hometown of Sangli, Maharashtra. The private wedding comes shortly after India‚Äôs triumphant Women‚Äôs World Cup campaign and will be attended by close friends and family following a week of pre-wedding festivities that celebrated the couple‚Äôs journey together.Mandhana and Muchhal first crossed paths in 2019 through mutual friends in Mumbai‚Äôs creative circles. Despite their busy and high-profile careers, the pair managed to keep their relationship largely private, away from the media spotlight. Their romance became public in July 2024 on their five-year anniversary via a social media post, highlighting the strong bond they had nurtured while continuing to focus on their respective professional commitments.The proposal was a romantic affair at DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai, where Palash blindfolded Smriti and led her to the very cricket pitch where she had played a pivotal role in India‚Äôs World Cup victory.There, on one knee, he proposed, creating a memorable moment the couple will cherish forever. To symbolize his dedication, Palash also got a tattoo of Smriti‚Äôs initials and jersey number, ‚ÄòSM18‚Äô, on his forearm.Breaking from tradition, the wedding will be held as an afternoon event. The pre-wedding celebrations have revealed a more expressive and playful side of Smriti, often known for her reserved nature. Choosing Sangli as the venue adds a personal touch, celebrating her roots and marking a significant milestone in her life, following her recent cricketing achievements.The couple has successfully balanced demanding careers‚ÄîSmriti in international cricket and Palash in Bollywood music‚Äîwhile maintaining a strong personal connection. Their relationship reflects both love and mutual support, proving that it is possible to nurture a meaningful bond even amidst the pressures of fame and professional life.
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana will marry music composer palash muchhal on november 23, 2025. The couple met in 2019 and kept their relationship private until july 2024. Palash proposed at dy patil stadium and got a tattoo of smriti‚Äôs initials and jersey number, ‚Äòsm18‚Äô

Article Title: ‚ÄúI love you so much‚Äù ‚Äì Bronny James' girlfriend Parker Whitfield sends sweet message for her mom as she celebrates special day
Article Text:
Bronny James and Parker Whitfield. Image via: Karwai Tang/ Getty Images

Parker Whitfield celebrates Salli Richardson-Whitfield‚Äôs birthday



Parker Whitfield celebrates her mom Salli Richardson-Whitfield‚Äôs birthday. Image via: Parker Whitfield/ Instagram

Bronny James and Parker Whitfield‚Äôs relationship continues to thrive



Parker Whitfield had a reason to pause and celebrate family this weekend, and she made sure the world knew exactly how she felt. The girlfriend of Los Angeles Lakers guard Bronny James marked her mother Salli Richardson‚Äôs birthday with a warm, personal tribute that blended nostalgia with genuine affection. Her post, shared with followers on Instagram, showed a throwback moment between the two and highlighted the bond they continue to share.The greeting revealed Whitfield‚Äôs unconditional love for her mother who called her ‚Äúbest friend‚Äù showing that the mother-daughter duo has enormous respect and support for each other.Parker Whitfield‚Äôs message for Salli Richardson-Whitfield was simple and unmistakably heartfelt. Sharing an old selfie where she wore a green swimsuit paired with a navy skirt, and her mother a patterned dress, Parker wrote, ‚Äúhappy birthday to my mommy I love you so much my best friend xoxo.‚ÄùSalli Richardson-Whitfield has built one of the most dynamic careers in the industry. With standout acting roles in A Low Down Dirty Shame and the long-running sci-fi series Eureka, she transitioned into directing and producing with remarkable success.The Emmy-nominated filmmaker continues to expand her impact, steering major projects like HBO‚Äôs upcoming Task starring Mark Ruffalo. She‚Äôs also returning to direct the final episodes of The Gilded Age Season 3.Her r√©sum√© reflects decades of versatility, from Luke Cage and The Wheel of Time to Scandal, American Gods, and SEE. And long before the director‚Äôs chair, she shared the screen with icons such as Samuel L. Jackson, Denzel Washington, and Will Smith.While Parker celebrated her mother, she recently received her own wave of birthday love from Bronny James. When she turned 21, Bronny marked the occasion with a warm tribute and a candid photo of the couple smiling behind her berry-themed cake. ‚ÄúHappy bday to my everything,‚Äù he wrote on Instagram.The couple has been public about their relationship since Parker confirmed it on National Boyfriend Day last year. Since then, she has been a regular presence at Bronny‚Äôs games, including his debut season with the Lakers in 2024.Bronny, now preparing for his sophomore year, has emphasized growth and commitment. ‚ÄúWe just got to come in here and come in the gym with a purpose and be ready to work every day and be ready to get better every day,‚Äù he told reporters earlier this year.Also Read: ‚ÄúMy marriage was beginning to crumble‚Äù ‚Äì Shaquille O'Neal‚Äôs ex Shaunie Henderson revealed real reason behind the NBA couple's divorce
Article Summary: Parker whitfield marked her mother salli richardson-whitfield‚Äôs birthday with a warm, personal tribute that blended nostalgia with genuine affection. Her post, shared with followers on instagram, showed a throwback moment between the two and highlighted the bond they continue to share.

Article Title: Real Madrid‚Äôs winless streak continues with 2-2 draw at Elche as Jude Bellingham strikes late
Article Text:
Jude Bellingham of Real Madrid (Photo by Angel Martinez/Getty Images)

Real Madrid's Jude Bellingham scored a late equalizer in the 87th minute to secure a 2-2 draw against Elche in Sunday's Spanish league match, extending Madrid's winless streak to three games while maintaining their one-point lead over Barcelona in the standings.Madrid had to fight back twice during the match, with Aleix Febas opening the scoring for Elche in the 53rd minute. Dean Huijsen equalized for Madrid in the 78th minute, but √Ålvaro Rodr√≠guez restored Elche's lead in the 84th minute before Bellingham's crucial equalizer three minutes later.The result comes after Madrid's recent goalless draw with Rayo Vallecano in the Spanish league and a 1-0 defeat to Liverpool in the Champions League . Prior to this run, Xabi Alonso's team had won 13 of their first 14 matches of the season.Vin√≠cius J√∫nior made an appearance as a second-half substitute for Madrid, while Elche's V√≠ctor Chust received a red card in stoppage time. Elche, currently in 11th place, has not won in their last six league matches.In other Spanish league action, Atletico Madrid secured their fifth consecutive victory with a 1-0 win over Getafe, thanks to an own goal by Domingos Duarte in the 82nd minute. The win extends Atletico's winning streak since their 4-0 loss to Arsenal in the Champions League.Veteran midfielder Koke reached a milestone with his 700th appearance for Atletico. The team played without goalkeeper Jan Oblak, who was injured during international duty with Slovenia, and forward Giuliano Simeone.Real Betis, currently in fifth place, drew 1-1 with struggling Girona. Vladyslav Vanat scored for Girona in the 20th minute, with Valent√≠n G√≥mez equalizing for Betis in the 75th minute. Betis forward Antony was sent off during stoppage time.Last-placed Oviedo and 13th-placed Rayo Vallecano played to a goalless draw. The match saw two red cards, with Oviedo's Ilyas Chaira dismissed in the 52nd minute and Rayo's Path√© Ciss sent off in stoppage time.Oviedo's winless streak has now reached seven matches across all competitions, while Rayo Vallecano has failed to secure a victory in their last three league games.
Article Summary: Jude bellingham scores late equalizer for real madrid in 2-2 draw with elche. Real madrid's winless streak extended to three games. Atletico madrid secured fifth consecutive victory with 1-0 win over getafe. Oviedo and rayo vallecano played to a goalless draw.

Article Title: Wei Yi, Sindarov Javokhir the new Candidates
Article Text:
Wei Yi (Image credit: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Vidit Gujrathi Exclusive: FIDE World Cup heartbreak, Goa controversy, bond with Anish Giri

NAGPUR: Fortune favours the brave and patience pays dividends. That was the twin morals of the story of Wei Yi earning his maiden Candidates berth, which the Chinese No. 1 secured on Sunday in Goa by reaching the Chess World Cup final. The tiebreak drama unfolded in the first set of 15-minute rapid games, within just under 2 hours of play, where the top two ranked grandmasters, youngest semifinalist Sindarov Javokhir and the oldest Wei Yi, registered contrasting victories to set up a title clash from Monday.While 19-year-old Sindarov defeated childhood friend Yakubboev Nodirbek in an all-Uzbekistan semifinal by snatching an early lead, the battle between Russia No. 2 Andrey Esipenko and world rapid No. 4 Wei was a contest of blunders, won by the ‚Äúlucky‚Äù Chinese GM.In the all-Uzbek semifinal, Sindarov took the lead by winning the first game with black in 47 moves. In the double-rook endgame, Sindarov made his pawn do all the business as he utilised his clock well to carve out a classy win. When Yakubboev took over 4 minutes to make his 13th move, Sindarov had the time under his control.Despite not making any notable moves, Sindarov sealed the fate of his friend, who was left with no option but to resign with just 13 seconds left on the clock as against 2 minutes for his younger compatriot.In the following game, Sindarov played a fighting 54-move draw, making the most of his extra pawn to become the youngest GM in the Candidates tournament by reaching the final.The second board battle between the experienced Chinese and Russian GMs was a topsy-turvy contest in both games. While Wei had an opportunity to clinch the opening game with his black pieces, he missed the winning sequence and split the points with Esipenko on the 36th turn by repeating the moves.The following game saw all the drama where the Russian, on the verge of victory, hanged his rook to hand a heartbreak resignation while the Chinese star continued to make his moves as if saying to himself, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs never over until it‚Äôs over.‚ÄùThe 46-minute, 57-move game saw incredible final drama. First, Esipenko missed a win, and Wei played a couple of game-saving moves with just 1 second remaining on the clock. Still, things were under the control of Esipenko, who, with 2 extra pawns, was on the verge of qualifying for the World Cup final before he made the big rook-hanging blunder.On the 56th move, when Wei brought his knight back, Esipenko had a brain-fade moment as he forgot that his rook was under attack. Instead of placing his rook to safety, Esipenko made a blunder by advancing his passive (c6) pawn. Wei took just a second to capture Esipenko‚Äôs rook, and the Russian resigned while the Chinese qualified for both the World Cup final and the Candidates tournament.Wei said, ‚ÄúI was so lucky in this tournament. In the second game, Esipenko was winning, and I was fighting for a draw. Since this is a long tournament, he was tired, and he blundered. Earning the Candidates berth is one of the biggest goals of my career.‚ÄùDespite the rook-hanging drama, Esipenko will get another chance to qualify for the Candidates in the knockout World Cup when he meets Yakubboev in the more anticipated third-place playoffs from Monday.
Article Summary: Chinese no. 1 wei yi qualifies for the chess world cup final in goa. He will face russian no. 2 andrey esipenko in a title clash on monday. Youngest semifinalist sindarov javokhir beat childhood friend yakubboev nodirbek.

Unlike standard word games, players must detect subtle links between words, which can range from obvious to highly nuanced or abstract. The game is freely available on mobile devices and desktop platforms, allowing enthusiasts to play anytime, anywhere, at their convenience.Its combination of easy-to-understand mechanics, challenging puzzles, and complex problem-solving has turned it into a daily ritual for many. Identify patterns or associations to sort them into four correct categories.Yes, the game provides subtle hints to guide players without revealing the answers outright.Yes, it is available for free on both mobile devices and desktop platforms.It sharpens pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral reasoning, and problem-solving skills.
Article Summary: Nyt connections is a captivating word association game designed to test analytical thinking, lateral reasoning, and cognitive flexibility. Article Title: Shattering records and cultivating future stars
Article Text:
Mayura Shanbaug

Ashish Kumar Srivastava - MD and CEO of PNB MetLife

Sameer Bansal - Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife

Chirag Shetty - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Satwiksairaj Rankireddy - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Disclaimer: Content Produced by PNB Metlife

The 7th PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide, earning global recognition and fostering a culture of resilience and determination in aspiring badminton starsIn a spectacular display of badminton prowess and youthful enthusiasm, the 7th edition of the PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship (JBC) etched its name in the annals of sporting history. Celebrating a staggering participation of 8257 young champions from across India, the championship not only broke its own record set in 2022 but also clinched the title of the ‚ÄòMost kids participating in a Badminton Championship in multiple cities‚Äô as recognised by the World Record Certification Agency (WRCA).The grand finale unfolded at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium in New Delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton. The event, graced by chief guests Chirag Shetty and Satwik Rankireddy, Asian Games Gold Medalists and JBC 2023 mentors, was a true celebration of the sport‚Äôs rising stars.The 10-city extravaganza, spanning the length and breadth of the country, showcased the unwavering commitment of PNB MetLife in nurturing young talents in the badminton arena. With participants exceeding 8200, it‚Äôs evident that the PNB MetLife JBC has become a beacon for aspiring shuttlers, highlighting the deep-seated passion for badminton among the diverse and talented youth of India.Beyond the glitz and glamour of the record-breaking numbers, the championship holds a special place in the hearts of those at the helm. Ashish Kumar Srivastava, MD and CEO of PNB MetLife, expressed pride in not just surpassing their own world record but also in contributing to India‚Äôs glory on the international badminton stage. The championship, he emphasized, is not merely a competition but a significant milestone in creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem.This edition of the JBC saw a strategic partnership with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, who served as mentors for the young talents. Sameer Bansal, Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife, acknowledged the pivotal role played by these champions in inspiring the next generation of badminton stars. The focus, according to Bansal, is on unleashing the latent potential of young shuttlers and preparing them for global excellence.The Delhi chapter of the championship witnessed some nail-biting action with over 1000 participants competing fiercely across various categories. From Ananya Talyan‚Äôs stellar performance in Girls Singles Under 9 to Divyansh Rawat‚Äôs triumph in Boys Singles Under 17, the young talents left no shuttle unturned in their quest for victory.The results from the Delhi leg not only showcased the raw talent but also highlighted the championship‚Äôs commitment to breaking barriers. The PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship is not just about records; it‚Äôs about fostering a culture of healthy living, determination, and resilience among the future champions of the sport.In the words of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, the championship serves as an invaluable platform.---------------------------------------------------------------As we celebrate the successful culmination of the 7th edition of PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship , we take pride in surpassing our own world record for highest participation and for being recognized by World Record Certification Agency. Beyond the records, JBC represents a significant milestone in our mission to lay the groundwork for India‚Äô s glory and success on the international badminton stage by creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem that nurtures champions at the grassroots levelThis year has been especially remarkable for PNB MetLife JBC as we joined hands with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy as JBC Mentors for the young talents associated with this tournament. They have played a pivotal role in inspiring young shuttlers to dream big and elevate their game and skills. We are eager for the next edition to unfold in our journey of unveiling the latent badminton potential across our nation and preparing them for global excellenceIt‚Äôs inspiring to witness the boundless talent and enthusiasm within our young athletes. My journey as JBC mentor has been incredibly fulfilling, as I got the opportunity to guide these budding champions and witness the journey of these young badminton stars. This championship is more than a competition; it is a platform that nurtures dreams, ignites aspirations, and, I believe, it is laying the foundation for future gold medalists in the makingTournaments like these serve as an invaluable platform for nurturing and harnessing the potential of our country‚Äôs young badminton stars. Witnessing the enthusiasm, passion, and skill displayed by these emerging shuttlers reinforces the belief that our country has an immense reservoir of talent. My association as a JBC mentor has been a source of immense pride, particularly given the role that the championship is playing in creating an incredible platform that is serving as a powerful catalyst, empowering young players and bolstering their confidence to become future champions
Article Summary: The 7th pnb metlife junior badminton championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide. The grand finale unfolded at the indira gandhi indoor stadium in new delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton.
